thread.title: Henderson Hospital, set to open next year, names CEO

title: Henderson Hospital, set to open next year, names CEO
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
Sam Kaufman, the chief executive officer of Desert Springs Hospital, will lead Henderson Hospital when it opens
